article.title: Semiclassical dynamics of spin density waves

multiple_choice_question.text: Which phase is NOT present in the triangular-lattice Hubbard model with NN hopping t as shown in the phase diagram?
What do the green arrows in Figures 1(b) and 1(c) represent?

choices: Decrease in electron density with increasing U/t.
Increase in average spin length (<|m|>) with increasing U/t.
Suppression of spiral order at large U/t.
Emergence of superconductivity at low U/t.
Equilibrium properties of the SDW state.
Adiabatic dynamics of the SDW order parameter.
Quantum fluctuations of the electron spin.
Electron transport in the presence of disorder.

multiple_choice_question.text: What is the physical meaning of the term (HSDW)/âˆ‚mi in formula (9)?
choices: Effective magnetic field acting on the SDW field.
Energy dissipation rate of the SDW.

multiple_choice_question.text: What approximation is implicitly used in deriving formula (9)?
choices: Neglecting spatial fluctuations of the SDW field.
